alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 9:58PM PST until March 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sustained northwest to northerly winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts around 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley and Mojave Desert in eastern Kern County. * WHEN...Early Thursday morning through Thursday early evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Power outages could occur. Blowing dust or sand can temporarily cause lowered visibilities. Travel may be difficult at times, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 58, Highway 178, U.S. Highway 395, and Highway 14.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
